titleStmt.title: A speech spoken by St. Thomas Wroth, knight in the honourable House of Commons vpon his delivery of a petition from the knights, gentlemen and freeholders of the county of Somerset February 25, 1642 : together with the petition of the said county then delivered.
titleStmt.author: Wroth, Thomas, Sir, 1584-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
